00072 #define PDCA_TRANSFER_COMPLETE                AVR32_PDCA_TRC_MASK
00073 #define PDCA_TRANSFER_COUNTER_RELOAD_IS_ZERO  AVR32_PDCA_RCZ_MASK

00092 } pdca_channel_options_t;
